entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 8:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

Temperature: 1.4°C

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 12 except 8 along the Fundy coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 12 except 8 along the Fundy coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
